channel.title: CVE Feed for Progress Software Corporation -- Telerik Report Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Progress Software Corporation -- Telerik Report Server

item.title: CVE-2024-7292|2024-10-16T15:01:22.209Z -- progress%20software%20corporation -- telerik%20report%20server
item.description: In Progress® Telerik® Report Server versions prior to 2024 Q3 (10.2.24.806), a credential stuffing attack is possible through improper restriction of excessive login attempts.

item.title: CVE-2024-7294|2024-10-09T14:45:30.445Z -- progress%20software%20corporation -- telerik%20report%20server
item.description: In Progress® Telerik® Report Server versions prior to 2024 Q3 (10.2.24.806), an HTTP DoS attack is possible on anonymous endpoints without rate limiting.

item.title: CVE-2024-7292|2024-10-09T14:47:10.831Z -- progress%20software%20corporation -- telerik%20report%20server
item.description: In Progress® Telerik® Report Server versions prior to 2024 Q3 (10.2.24.806), a credential stuffing attack is possible through improper restriction of excessive login attempts.

item.title: CVE-2024-7293|2024-10-09T14:43:28.711Z -- progress%20software%20corporation -- telerik%20report%20server
item.description: In Progress® Telerik® Report Server versions prior to 2024 Q3 (10.2.24.806), a password brute forcing attack is possible through weak password requirements.

item.title: CVE-2024-4358|2024-08-01T20:40:46.999Z -- progress%20software%20corporation -- telerik%20report%20server
item.description: In Progress Telerik Report Server, version 2024 Q1 (10.0.24.305) or earlier, on IIS, an unauthenticated attacker can gain access to Telerik Report Server restricted functionality via an authentication bypass vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-6327|2024-07-25T03:55:23.541Z -- progress%20software%20corporation -- telerik%20report%20server
item.description: In Progress® Telerik® Report Server versions prior to 2024 Q2 (10.1.24.709), a remote code execution attack is possible through an insecure deserialization vulnerability.

item.description: In Progress® Telerik® Report Server versions prior to 2024 Q2 (10.1.24.709), a remote code execution attack is possible through an insecure deserialization vulnerability.
